title: A random dream
body: Had a dream that league has these new boots that were like gold and it's passive was like every few seconds you  could randomly go faster like exploding idk this could be a vision kek

replies.body:
Hahah like a power burst! 

Power Burst: Movement speed double and decays over 4 seconds. Charge bulids every 30 seconds. Can have 3 charges stored.

They could be kiting shoes.
